inclusion.criterion: referred for abdominal CT in portal venous phase
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ≥ 18 years and competent to sign an informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Renal insufficiency (defined as Glomerular Filtration Rate (GFR) < 30 mL/min/1,73m2
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Wilson disease, which is a genetic disorder that affects the liver and brain. He has been experiencing tremors since a year ago and has a Kayser-Fleischer ring in his ophthalmologic exam.
